name: Zombie Manor
description:
In this top down zombie shooter you have to Navigate through dark corridors and rooms to find an exit.

And of course there are Zombies who want to eat you.

Its up to you to collect as much cash as possible

Contains:

2D Light Engine

High Score List.

Survival gameplay.

5 Maps.

2 kinds of zombies, fast and slow ones.

Maps are looped with increasing difficulty.

Currently there is no Music or SFX.

You can change your controls in the main screen or by deleting the mapping.keys file.

Default Controls:

W,A,S,D -> Movement

J -> Shoot and breakout Free from zombies.

K-> Hold down to freeze player direction ( strafe walking )


warning: Contains pixelated blood and gore (-;


For more info pls read the included readme file.



Made From Scratch with GLBASIC For the LOW REZ JAM 2016

during 8 days
